Scan came to a halt, hearing Magmatron's message.


Scan: D'OH!...


Scan t=
urns around and heads back towards the Destron base...
  ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
  From: Rudra656@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent:=
 Wednesday, October 17, 2001 10:17 PM
  Subject: Magmatron's plan


  OOC: =
Thanks.  And thanks for taking Neody. 

  ::Magmatron:: 
        He thinks =
for a moment.  "We're going to go ahead with securing that second base in S=
yria.  The Trainers have been eliminated.  That leaves the Predacons."  He =
opens another com.  "All Destrons report to the Sulaco ASAP."  He returns t=
o Halucigen.  "Our numbers seem to have dwindled recently.  I suspect trait=
ors.  This means we shall have to rely on others to help us."  He brings up=
 a map and points to the new Maximal City.  "There is a battle there right =
now.  If we help the Maximals, we will be in a position to extract their as=
sistance.  I will also send a communiqu=E9 to Zardus.  (He doesn't know Zar=
dus left.)  Between the Maximals and the Alliance we will crush the Predaco=
ns in their own base." 
  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo=
! Terms of Service.
